title: Air Guard units join forces for aerial wildfire suppression training
description: Military and civilian flight crews wrapped up a week of aerial wildfire suppression training on April 27, concluding the annual Modular Airborne Firefighting Systems spring training at Channel Islands Air National Guard Station in southern California.
content:
Published April 30, 2025By Senior Master Sgt. Paula Macomber152nd Airlift Wing

title: Israel's Netanyahu declares emergency as wildfires spread near Jerusalem
description: Wind-fueled fires in Israel are tearing through brush outside Jerusalem, prompting the evacuation of residents and leaving more than a dozen people hospitalized.
content: Bet Shemesh, Israel — Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu warned on Wednesday that rapidly spreading wildfires near Jerusalem could reach the city, as he declared the situation a "national emer… [+5362 chars]
